channel.title: Verticals-rsses on Kevin Webber
channel.description: Recent content in Verticals-rsses on Kevin Webber

item.title: E-commerce
item.description:
The concepts of Reactive Application Development and Design (RAD/D) have proven themselves to drive incredible business value in e-commerce. Now more shoppers shop online during Black Friday holiday events than in store.

Off-the-shelf solutions may get you part of the way, what if you’re a business that requires 99.999999% uptime across millions of page views per minute? We can help.

item.title: Finance
item.description:
Financial services is a varied industry with many diverse needs. Balancing the availability of systems with the consistency of systems is crucial, all while maintaining an inviting and predictable user experience.

We can help you leverage best-in-breed technologies in the field of stream processing, big data, derp.
